meanings.sent1: She pratingly chatted on and on about nothing in particular.
meanings.sent2: He always has a pratingly long story to tell.
meanings.sent3: The pratingly parrot in the pet store entertained the customers with its endless chatter.
meanings.sent4: Her pratingly cheerful demeanor brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The pratingly loud alarm clock woke her up every morning.

meanings.definition: Speaking in a foolish or childish manner.
meanings.sent1: The pratingly child kept interrupting the teacher with silly questions.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a pratingly silly look when he made a joke.
meanings.sent3: The pratingly playful puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His pratingly innocent expression fooled no one.
meanings.sent5: The pratingly naive boy believed everything he was told.
